section.p: supports you in customizing the stage of a marketplace. The stage is the area of the marketplace where you can place, for example, advertisements, eye catchers, or further information.
The marketplace stage can be provided as an image or as HTML code linking, for example, to animations. allows you to use a separate stage for each of the supported languages.
You specify the stage as HTML code referencing the desired stage image. For optimum display, you can use different stage images for desktop and mobile devices.
A preview function allows you to view a stage before it is published. As soon as you confirm the preview, the stage is published and visible to all visitors of the marketplace.
To customize the marketplace stage, use the Customize stage menu option in the Marketplace menu of the administration portal.
